subject: RESPONSE FROM JP Morgan Chase Bank /// TO MR. DENISE,
body:
*SIR YOU MAY BE SCAMMED BY IMPOSTORS BUT THIS IS 100% LEGAL. SO ALL YOU
NEED TO DO IS TO SEND US YOUR BANK DETAILS WHERE YOUR MONEY WILL BE
TRANSFERRED. I  WAIT TO HEAR FROM YOU.*

*THANK YOU,*
*JAMES DIMON*

subject: Re: RESPONSE FROM JP Morgan Chase Bank /// TO MR. DENISE,
body:
Hello James Dimon,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm really excited about this opportunity. However, I would like to know more about the process and how it works. Could you please explain it in detail? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Denise

subject: Re: RESPONSE FROM JP Morgan Chase Bank /// TO MR. DENISE,
body:
*JP Morgan Chase Bank of New York*
*270 Park Avenue, 39th Floor,*
*Webside: www.jpmorgan..com <http://www.jpmorgan..com/> / wss*
*https://chaseonline.chase.com/ <https://chaseonline.chase.com/>*



*Attn:  M**R.  *  DENISE  *,*


*This is to confirm the receipt of your mail to me with the content well
noted to me and I want you to know that this transaction is 100% legal with
no element of scam in it, cause i am a man with a dignity character that
would not miss-lead you with this fund, cause it is against my biblical way
as a Christian and i am giving you my full assurance that you are going to
receive this fund without any hitches and i need your maximum co-operation
with honesty to me in this transaction move with no further delay because
your information to us has been scrutinize orderly as instructed to us to
release the fund to you as the sole beneficiary of the said approve.*

*But before we proceed with the long awaited fund release order to you as
approved and sign from the united states president with the board of
directors and order stakeholder in the government and from the UN secretary
general office to release the long awaited fund to you but before we
proceed i would like you to choose from are three method of are payment
given to you below for a quick procession of your payment to enable you
receive your fund without any further delay.*

*(1) KTT wire transfer..................*
*(2) ATM MASTER CARD withdrawal.................*
*(3) Online banking wire transfer...................... .*

*As soon as I hear from you with your option of payment I will switch into
action of your approved payment to you without any further delay. And your
maximum co-operation with us in this transaction will empower us to effect
the release of your approved fund to you upon the receipt of the above
option of payment.*

*Thank you*

*Mr. James Dimon.*
*Executive Managing Director*
*Operating Committee of JP Morgan Chase*

subject: Re: RESPONSE FROM JP Morgan Chase Bank /// TO MR. DENISE,
body:
Hello Mr. James Dimon,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed information provided. I appreciate your assurance regarding the legality of this transaction, it's comforting to know that there are still people with integrity out there.

I'm intrigued by the three methods of payment you've mentioned - KTT wire, ATM MASTER CARD, and Online banking wire. Could you please provide more details about each method? Specifically, I'd like to understand how they work, their processing times, and if there are any fees associated with them.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Denise

subject: Re: RESPONSE FROM JP Morgan Chase Bank /// TO MR. DENISE,
body:
*JP Morgan Chase Bank of New York*

*www.jpmorgan..com/wss*

            *NOTIFICATION OF ACCOUNT CREDITING FROM CHASE BANK OF NY*



*Attention: MR. *   DENISE  *,*


*IN RESPECT OF YOUR EMAIL WELL NOTED TO ME, SIR THERE IS NO WAY WE CAN
DEDUCT BECAUSE THE MONEY IS IN A DORMANT ACCOUNT. AND ALSO I WILL ADVISE
YOU TO USE ATM MASTER CARD, BECAUSE YOU CAN MAKE WITH-DRAWERS IN ANY PART
OF THE COUNTRY. IF YOU AGREE WITH ATM MASTER CARD WE WILL LOAD THE FUND
INTO THE ATM MASTER CARD, AND SEND IT THROUGH DHL COURIER COMPANY. HERE IS
THE THREE OPTION :*


*(1) KTT wire transfer.................. $1,250*
*(2) ATM MASTER CARD withdrawal................. $250*
*(3) Online banking wire transfer................. $2,750*



*Yours Truly.*

*  Mr. James Dimon.*
*The Executive Director*
*JP Chase Morgan Bank New York*

subject: Re: RESPONSE FROM JP Morgan Chase Bank /// TO MR. DENISE,
body:
Hello Mr. James Dimon,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed information provided. I'm a bit confused about the dormant account situation, could you please explain it a bit more? 

Also, regarding the ATM Master Card option, how does that work exactly? Is it safe and secure to have such a large amount of funds on a card? And how would I be able to access those funds once they are loaded onto the card?

I appreciate your assistance in this matter.

Best wishes,
Denise
